name: Barley, Bobtail barley, Little barley, Vernal barley
overview: Barley has glumes (forming the husk of grain) which are spread while young and will straighten with age. Has spring bloom period (March through May)
habitat: Although Naive to Europe, many are found throughout western United States. It prefers alkaline or waste places at low elevations.
